full_text:
I have updated the #nflverse package {nflplotR} today with a more general applicable image geom that can load images from urls or local paths, apply transparency and provides robust aspect ratio. 
The example also shows how to use this in annotations.

https://t.co/ehGFNuQbpy https://t.co/sRKCmQ7E2K

As a bettor, while interesting, it's irrelevant what  Shanahan could do with a ‚Äúbetter‚ÄùQB or how good Jimmy G is out of scheme. What's relevant is that since returning from injury he's been playing at career high level & SF O has been fantastic with its full weaponry

#nflverse https://t.co/iMoBKamo3y

Speaking of Jimmy G, let's check QBs EPA rankings after correcting for YAC over expected. Garoppolo has the most EPA generated by his WRs, however, he is still 7th in EPA when accounting for this. Other QBs getting helped by YAC o/e are Mahomes (-8) and Burrow (-8). #nflverse https://t.co/ERHkwjEDOt

Presenting the 2021 Jameis Winston Awards üèÜ 

These honors are given to players who frequently "go big" or "go home".

QBs: Many Big Plays (>20 yds), Many Picks
WRs: Many Big Plays and Drops
RBs: Many Big Plays, Many Negative Rushes
CBs: Many Picks, Many Yards Allowed 
#nflverse https://t.co/hpv24QSoMR

Here are the best Wide Receiver Bargains of 2021:

üòê5 WRs from the 2019 Draft Class are in the top 10, all of whom the Pats took N'Keal Harry over!
üèà At least Jakobi Meyers is great (cc @Cooper_DFF)
ü¶Å Amon-Ra St. Brown in the 4th round was a steal

Data: #nflverse & @Jason_OTC https://t.co/xM5IaespSl
Rookie QB performance update. I was told all rookie QBs play just as bad as Zach Wilson. #nflverse https://t.co/xWcFV47h6n
My analysis shows the Browns and Raiders really understand how to make a game better #NFLverse https://t.co/QvQvi2xAn8

Difference in QB stats when targeting their WR1 vs all other receivers

No surprise in the top 4. Brandon Cooks and Marvin Jones are likely so high because of their talent devoid receiving cores
#NFLverse https://t.co/0vNdKIoq5P

New #Tableau Viz powered by #nflverse üèà

'Late Blooming Pass Catchers, the Rise of a King, and Why You Should Think Twice Before Drafting Aaron Jones Next Year

A data dive into fantasy starters and a lifetime of value'

https://t.co/JVvv5h9f11

The #nflverse Game Data and https://t.co/sWcfd2gLrn have been updated to reflect the announced schedule changes.

Note that for the prediction game, your existing predictions are still recorded for the new dates/times. It's up to you to change them if you want to.

Was curious to see how teams have been using no huddle this season, and the results were interesting:
*Indy really needs a huddle to be successful
*Zac Taylor and Matt Rhule leaving meat on the proverbial bone is not that shocking
*The Bucs are elite, no matter what

#nflverse https://t.co/Ciq3UrahQr

Completion % on passes of 15 or more air yards, 2006-2021 (min. 60 attempts):

1) Nick Mullens, 57% (56 of 98)
2) Kurt Warner, 54% (187 of 346)
3) Drew Brees, 52% (929 of 1,787)

Data: #nflverse
Merry Christmas to #nflverse üéÖüéÖüéÖ https://t.co/29fWeAk8i5

ffsimulator 1.2.0 has been published to CRAN! It has a new experimental feature for calculating fantasy wins added over replacement (at the player level), and also some fixes for CRAN related complaints. Give it a spin! 

#rstats #nflverse

Last night's game was the 7th worst of Brady's career in EPA/play.

The worst game with Bucs? Saints in 2020.

Sean Payton owned this game.

Data: #nflverse

#RStats #ggplot2 https://t.co/qR0KV5Ej2v
